1. [Home](https://www.rftx.org/)
2. [City Council](https://www.rftx.org/citycouncil)


Candidate election packets can be picked up at City Hall from the City Secretary, Monday - Thursday, 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM

Packets can be turned in starting Monday, July 21st, 2025 - Monday, August 18th, 2025
